availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Silas E. Duckworth (Larue County, Kentucky, farmer and 2nd lieut 37th Ky Inf USA)

body.p: Larue County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. Kentucky native. Married to E. A. Duckworth. Father of J. W. Duckworth, S. G. Duckworth, J. D. Duckworth, T. M. Duckworth, and E. W. Duckworth. Farmer in Larue County, Kentucky, in 1860. Served in the 37th Kentucky Volunteer Mounted Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) as second lieutenant from December 23, 1863, to August 8, 1864.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Larue County, p. 16.
Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 1, 1861-1866 (Frankfort: Kentucky Yeoman Office, 1866), 380.
